text: "Sexcrime (Nineteen Eighty-Four)" is a 1984 song by Eurythmics. It is the leading single from their album 1984 (For the Love of Big Brother) and the soundtrack to the 1984 movie Nineteen Eighty-Four. It went to the top 10 in the United Kingdom, Germany, New Zealand, Australia, Belgium, Ireland, France, Switzerland, Sweden and Norway. It also made number 81 in the United States. ==Track listings== ===7"=== *A: "Sexcrime (1984)" (LP Version) – 3:57 *B: "I Did It Just The Same" (LP Version) – 3:32 ===12"=== *A: "Sexcrime (1984)" (Extended Mix) – 8:01 *B1: "Sexcrime (1984)" (LP Version) – 3:57 *B2: "I Did It Just the Same" (LP Version) – 3:32 ===3" CD Re-Issue=== *A: "Sexcrime (1984)" (Extended Mix) – 8:01 *B1: "Julia" (LP Version) – 6:38 *B2: "I Did It Just the Same" (LP Version) – 3:32 Category:1984 songs Category:Eurythmics songs
title: Sexcrime (Nineteen Eighty-Four) (song)
